mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, John, 1790-1862
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sends congratulations on his elevation to the head of the Post Office Department; asks him to use his influence to assist his brother William Tyler to obtain the position of a naval store keeper at the Washington Navy Yard or one elsewhere of a "corresponding character"; gives a biographical description of his brother. Autograph Letter Signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1853 March 10, John Tyler, Sherwood Forest, Virginia to James Campbell, Post Master General
